title: Teacher who stopped shooter "still processing"
text:
Teacher who stopped shooter "still processing" 10:23am IST - 00:36
Indiana teacher Jason Seaman, who was shot while tackling a school shooter in Indiana last week, says doing so was the “only acceptable actions given the circumstances”, and praised student Ella Whistler, who is still recovering in the hospital after also being shot. Rough Cut (no reporter narration)
